CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE
1972 CODE
;adv=10; This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1972 Code, as supplemented through September 18, 1978, which are included herein. Sections of the 1972 Code, as supplemented, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete, or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND

this Code
